body: Ah, wait.  Everything is running ok on my machine with your EPW, Abraham, and Saba's GH file: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jPkKNYv*PqSaTj*Ah5lMfe2VNWGikuf0hJNu9BR2CRlb2RRfU3CDQUZbu7jyxVrHKg-z1ytiFYBxdHRdXzEaz*CrwMFFU66-/Allgood.JPG) Saba, is Abraham's EPW the one that gave you the error? -Chris
